title: Americans Aren’t Getting Married Anymore FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: The Pew Research Center on Wednesday came out with a big report on the decline of marriage in the United States. A record 1 in 5 Americans 25 or older have never been married, up from 1 in 10 in 1960. The report is full of interesting tidbits. The gender gap is widening: Men are […]
